message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000 for it. This is my maximum budget for this purchase. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $15,000 is my minimum, I'm willing to compromise slightly. How about $16,000? This would allow me to make a reasonable profit while still being fair to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I am unable to go above $15,000 for the product. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
